titulo: Fullstack Developer (React and Node.js) - Mid level  to Senior
descripcion:
• We're looking for mid-level - senior fullstack developers to join our team!

    If you're fluent in English and JavaScript is your area of expertise, join us to work in our projects using React.js and Node.js.

    If you're good with any (or both) of those platforms AND have 3-8 years of experience, send your resume (English version) to ********.******@theksquaregroup.com

    If you're qualified, we'll make an offer based on your current salary. We have a wide range (depending on experience) starting at 50,000 DOP.

    I would like to give you more details about our offer!
